snippet: Markets closed lower, and retailers’ shares fell after department store chains reported disappointing results.
abstract: Stocks end down as more retailers report poor first-quarter sales.
lead_paragraph: Markets closed lower, and retailers’ shares fell after department store chains reported disappointing results.

headline.main: Wall St. Sinks as Retail Woes Mount
headline.print_headline: Wall St. Continues to Sink as Retail Woes Mount
